title: Dawn Takes a Closer Look at Occator
description: The bright spots are much brighter than the rest of Ceres' surface, and tend to appear overexposed in most images. This view is a composite of two images of Occator: one using a short exposure that captures the detail in the bright spots, and one where the background surface is captured at normal exposure.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
